name: Vinh Hung 2 Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had stayed at the hotel for 10 days last year and loved it but this year it was very crowded and noisy. Our first room was a superior room overlooking the street which was very noisy and we asked to be moved to a standard room overlooking the pool. If you have a room on the first floor these are very quiet but on the second floor there is a lot of noise from the water pumps. The breakfast is adequate but pretty boring after 2 or 3 days - there was very little choice. So. although the staff are very helpful and friendly we felt that this hotel needs to try a little harder to keep up with the competition.
reviews.title: Could do better

reviews.text: We're currently travelling through Vietnam and made our first stop in Hoi An. We were there for 3 nights.
reviews.title: We want to go back to Hoi An just to stay here again.

reviews.text: The hotel arranged a car to collect us from Da Nang airport (which is roughly 30 minutes away) for $20 USD, a taxi costs roughly 350,000 Dong for the same journey so the price is about right. Friendly driver, clean car, no hassle!
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel
Staying in Hoi An
reviews.text: The hotel itself is beautiful, and the staff are really nice and helpful. We loved our room although the hot water delivery was a little inconsistent. The laundry service was great and well priced, and the mini bar pricing was also very reasonable.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel to family and friends!
reviews.title: Very nice hotel not far from downtown

reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at the Vinh Hung 2 Hotel. My 3rd floor room was HUGE, with an office/work area and a very comfortable bed. The hotel is located only a short stroll from the streets of the old town of Hoi An. This hotel is very reasonably priced and I found it to be a much better value than another property I had checked into the day before and promptly checked out of after one night's stay. I would recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a nice property in a good location at a great value.
reviews.title: Nice property, huge room, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was beautiful, with large pool, clean, large rooms with balconies, friendly, helpful staff, free breakfast, and great location.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel in great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent nearly 3 weeks here and considered it good value for money for the price we paid. It is a budget hotel therefore the rooms have basic amenities such as one small soap per day, shampoo and a kettle plus 2 sachets of green tea per day. The swimming pool is refreshing and the restaurant has an extensive reasonably priced menu. The staff are very friendly and the buffet breakfast is plentiful and constantly topped up so food is always fresh. Due to the design of the hotel noise does echo and there is a constant problem with water pressure (we tried out three rooms during our stay and all had the same problem) as showers pumped out either scalding hot or cold water and the water could not be regulated no matter how hard we tried. Top floor rooms tend to be noisy because of the water pump and also dusty because of the open eaved ceilings. Bed linen is a little tired (some stained and holey) but the housemaids seemed oblivious to this when making up the beds! We were also very aware of how quickly the housemaids liked to “clean” the rooms each morning and then spend time sleeping in the linen cupboard next door to our room for the rest of the day!
reviews.title: OK for US$30 a night but no more!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Basically this hotel is good value for money but definitely worth no more than the $30 per night which we paid for our extended stay. It seems to have no problem getting guests to stay so perhaps the management should invest more money in it and replace the linen and do some refurbishing of fittings!
reviews.title: ok hotel, but located in very busy street

reviews.text: The hotel is ok, clean, spacious rooms, but our room was facing a very busy street. It was noisy.
reviews.title: Its OK but no sleep!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are just finished with a month's visit in Vietnam staying in many properties ranging from$100 to $25 nightly depending on mood and location. VH 2 was a super choice selected from TA and Agoda(great last minute deals). Rented a scooter, had laundry done, great breakfast choices, super location. Don't hesitate to just book it! Many top TA rated budget properties are booked in advance and I regretted not planning a bit more mindfully to find availability sooner. $25-$40 rooms fill quickly all over no matter what the season. Buy a cheap inrstricted cell phone then get a SIM card in each country to have cell access....I paid alot more for alot less all over the country!
reviews.title: Best Vietnam charmer and value out of 15 hotels!

reviews.text: Great location, we were able to walk everywhere. Charming hotel with friendly and helpful staff. We had a double and a triple room, which were small but comfortable and clean. Breakfast was basic, but nice. The centrally located pool, with all the rooms looking over it, gives it a lovely ambience, as does the foyer.
reviews.title: Charming but small rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Terrible service, rude management, bed bugs!!
reviews.title: WARNING BED BUGS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed one night and were woken by bed bug bites at 3am to find the head board and sheets covered in bugs and excretement. We had to argue with staff for a new room. On checking out we had to argue with management for a discount of $10.
reviews.title: Large clean room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Dont stay.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights (after one night in Vinh Hung 3 - see other review) and I can safely say that we would NEVER return or recommend this hotel. At first glance, it looks quite nice - there is a pool with loungers and extras like robes, shampoo etc. We checked in and everything seemed fine, then we went out for the evening, returning at about midnight. I noticed one or two small insects in the bed, but on closer inspection it turned out that the headboard was literally crawling with bedbugs and eggs. There were also tell-tale black marks on the headboard and sheets - bedbug excrement. We asked to see a manager with a view to changing rooms, but the night receptionist said that nobody was available and that we could not change rooms. He then sprayed the headboard with a foul smelling insect repellent (which, we have since discovered, is the worst thing you can do. The bugs potentially scurry into your cases away from the poison). We had to pull the bed away from the headboard, which revealed months worth of dust behind the bed, and sleep with out pillows at the other end of the bed. I slept fully clothed, but still got two big, itchy bites. The room smelled of repellent and needless to say, we did not have a good night's sleep.
reviews.title: BED BUGS BEWARE!!!! A TERRIBLE HOTEL

reviews.text: The next day we showed the shift manager the bugs (he had not been informed by the night receptionist - so we had to explain all over again). The cleaner brought in to assess the situation seemed to find it amusing!! We were given a different room and the porter who helped us move our bags actually waited for a tip! To be fair to him, he may not have been told about the situation, which further highlights the poor customer service and communication in this hotel. I suspect that the infested room would have been in use again after a quick clean...
reviews.title: could not be worse

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our second room was better, but the stay had been ruined. We were also woken at 730am by the noise of maintainance work being done in the hotel - someone using a hammer and chisel. Not good, considering we'd had little sleep the night before.
reviews.title: should be well hung to

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we went to check out, the manager on the desk had not been told about the bugs, so I had to explain all over again. The receptionist asked why we hadn't requested a different room- I had to explain that we only saw the bugs after midnight. The manager actually claimed that he'd been asleep in a room behind reception and that we should have told him on the night (he seemed to imply that we should have known where he was that night, although the night receptionist had claimed there was no manager available). We were made to feel as if we should have done more to resolve the problem ourselves. Then the manager had the cheek to try to charge me 60p for a glass I'd accidentally broken. In the end he grudgingly knocked the equivalent of about £2-3 off the final bill. His only concern was money, even when my partner tried to explain that bed bugs need to be controlled with care to avoid them spreading further.
reviews.title: It isn't nice as it looks like

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I acknowledge that even the best hotels can be infested with bedbugs - but staff should be trained to deal with them properly and customers should be made to feel that their comfort is priority. All in all, a terrible hotel.
reviews.title: Good quality experience

description: Vinh Hung 2 Hotel in Hoi An is the second hotel of the Vinh Hung Company. The newly renovated Vinh Hung 2 Hotel is located close to the Old Town of Hoi An, a World Heritage Site, with its famous Japanese Covered Bridge. The hotel includes a swimming pool where guests can spend the hot hours of the day and a restaurant that serves both Western and Vietnamese dishes. All the rooms, which have wooden floors and are well equipped with all the modern comforts a person would expect, have double glass windows with a view on the town or the swimming pool. Vinh Hung 2, like all the Vinh Hung hotels, has an informal atmosphere which makes the guests feel comfortable and at home.Vinh Hung 2 Hotel offers its guests affordable luxury right at the entrance of the famous Old Town!
